checkCreditLimit.conditionString: Limit must be within the Excess and Discretionary Limit - Check our CRM Database to confirm

isEntityRegistered.conditionString: Confirm the correct legal entity and company status (Must be registered)- Check ASIC

noNilCreditLimitIssued.conditionString: No Nil credit limits issued by other insurers in our database - TCR Portal

checkForGSTRegistration.conditionString: ABR check to confirm GST registration - ABN Lookup

entityIncorporated.conditionString: Make sure the company has been incorporated for at least 12 months - ASIC

courtChargesWithMinMaxAmount.conditionString: No court actions or legal or collection activity present above a maximum of $5,000 on a Limit up to $50,000

noAdverse.conditionString: No adverse against director/s, owner/s or Shareholders

soleTraderRegisteredForGST.conditionString: Sole Traders must be registered for GST - Check ASIC or ABN Lookup

reports: Illion Report: HTML Commercial Bureau Enquiry without ASIC Docs OR
Illion Report: HTML Commercial Bureau Enquiry w/ refresh ASIC w/o ASIC Docs
